relation: Great for these types of students
Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
They have many officers on campus and they usually get to any situation pretty quickly.
This is great for students who where ever told that they couldn't do it.
On the campus they have a waterfall area which also sets the day from getting out of class and socializing with associates.

I love the fact that HGTC has a large variety of different programs offer to students. The teachers also make sure the the students understand every thing even if they had to repeat themselves a hundred times.
They always have great family fun events throughout the school year.
They do not offer dorms or housing assistants because its a tech school.
I would encourage students to work hard because its not like being in high school.
HGTC is a great school where a very large quaintly of people can become successful . I would give HGTC a 10/10, because it a great school for people young and old to get a great education.

The max you will pay for a semester is $1500 plus your books or supplies., 103889=for only an average of $1700 a semester, you can't beat the cost!}

textAfterTable: Sophia from Myrtle Beach, SC 03/31/2015 Reviewer is A current student here. 1 out of 1 people found this review useful. 2 of 48 Categories Comments Campus Safety Extremely friendly public safety team, safe environment. Bang for the buck Classes are much more inexpensive compared to a 4 year degree. Worth thinking about completing your freshman and sophomore years here and then transferring if necessary. What to do for fun The beach is less than 10 minutes away. Tips for prospective students Talk to the advisors before registering! In three sentences The best school that offers great oppurtunities for students, a wonderful community of faculty who care about the students and an inexpensive way to take core college classes and earn an Associates.
